cast.name: 爱德华·欧莱瑞 Edward O'Leary

introduction: When Roberts best friend tricks him into speed dating, he never expected to run into the guy that ghosted him six months ago after an amazing 24 hours together. Questioning his worth in the gay dating scene, he hasn't dated since he met Brian. Convinced there is something wrong with him Robert sits through an evening of uncomfortable speed dates while he waits anxiously for his moment to understand why Brian never called.
